projects.title: Campus Bites
projects.description: A multi-page web application designed for students to browse, create, manage, and publish recipes. This project focuses on complex data relationships and role-based security.

features.title: Secure Authentication
features.desc: Implemented ASP.NET Core Identity for role-based security (User vs. Administrator)

features.title: Approval Workflow
features.desc: Built a logic flow where recipes move from "Draft" to "Pending" to "Published"

features.title: Data Integrity
features.desc: Utilized Entity Framework Core to manage complex relationships between Users, Recipes, and Categories

features.title: Admin Moderation
features.desc: System for reviewing uploaded images and ingredients before public visibility

features.title: Search Functionality
features.desc: Filter recipes by category and ingredients
